actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tax Reform Act of 1969 with respect to the application of the excess business holdings provisions to private foundations.

summary.text: Amends the Tax Reform Act of 1969 to exempt for ten years certain private foundations from the divestiture requirements imposed on private foundations having excess business holdings. Sets forth eligibility requirements for such exemption.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tax Reform Act of 1969 with respect to the application of the excess business holdings provisions to private foundations.
